Beginner Vocabulary - Page 1

Beginner

Beginner Vocabulary - Page 1

Welcome to our beginner vocabulary section! Here you'll find essential words that every English learner should know. These words are commonly used in everyday conversations and will help you build a strong foundation in English.

Navigation

This is page 1 of 9. Use the navigation below to explore all vocabulary pages.

How to Use This List

For each word, we provide:

  • The pronunciation (in International Phonetic Alphabet)
  • The part of speech
  • A clear definition
  • An example sentence
  • Synonyms (when applicable)

Try to memorize a few words each day and practice using them in sentences.

Word List

Hello

/həˈloʊ/

exclamation, noun

Used as a greeting or to begin a phone conversation.

salam

"Hello, how are you?"

"Salam, necəsən?"

Category: Greetings

Goodbye

/ˌɡʊdˈbaɪ/

exclamation, noun

Used when leaving or ending a conversation.

sağ ol, vidalaş

"Goodbye, see you tomorrow!"

"Sağ ol, sabah görüşərik!"

Category: Greetings

Please

/pliːz/

adverb

Used as a polite request or invitation.

zəhmət olmasa

"Could you please help me?"

"Zəhmət olmasa mənə kömək edə bilərsən?"

Category: Politeness

Thank you

/θæŋk juː/

phrase

Used to express gratitude.

təşəkkür edirəm

"Thank you for your help."

"Köməyiniz üçün təşəkkür edirəm."

Category: Politeness

Yes

/jɛs/

adverb

Used to give a positive answer.

bəli, hə

"Yes, I agree with you."

"Bəli, sizinlə razıyam."

Category: Basic Responses

No

/noʊ/

adverb

Used to give a negative answer.

yox, xeyr

"No, I don't want coffee."

"Xeyr, qəhvə istəmirəm."

Category: Basic Responses

Water

/ˈwɔːtər/

noun

A clear liquid that has no color, taste, or smell.

su

"I drink water every day."

"Mən hər gün su içirəm."

Category: Food & Drink

Food

/fuːd/

noun

Things that people and animals eat.

yemək

"This food tastes delicious."

"Bu yemək çox dadlıdır."

Category: Food & Drink

House

/haʊs/

noun

A building where people live.

ev

"My house has three bedrooms."

"Mənim evimin üç yataq otağı var."

Category: Places

School

/skuːl/

noun

A place where children learn.

məktəb

"I go to school every morning."

"Mən hər səhər məktəbə gedirəm."

Category: Places

Family

/ˈfæməli/

noun

Parents and their children.

aile

"I love my family very much."

"Mən ailəmi çox sevirəm."

Category: Relationships

Friend

/frɛnd/

noun

A person who you like and enjoy being with.

dost

"She's my best friend."

"O, mənim ən yaxşı dostumdur."

Synonyms: companion, buddy, pal

Category: Relationships

Page 1 of 9
